body.raw: You break the seal and read the contents of the letter. "Greetings party animal. Are you worthy of Plato’s Rave? The trials begin at 9:00 pm at The Container Store." There is no signature, but attached to the bottom of the letter is a single piece of hard candy in a plastic wrap.
body.html: You break the seal and read the contents of the letter. "Greetings party animal. Are you worthy of Plato’s Rave? The trials begin at 9:00 pm at The Container Store." There is no signature, but attached to the bottom of the letter is a single piece of hard candy in a plastic wrap.

body.raw: A knock at your door. You’re new in town and haven’t had a chance to meet your neighbors yet. Could it be one of them? When you open the door, nothing is in front of you except for a small `ENVELOPE` at your feet. The `ENVELOPE` has a wax seal pressed into the shape of a wrapped hard candy.
body.html: A knock at your door. You’re new in town and haven’t had a chance to meet your neighbors yet. Could it be one of them? When you open the door, nothing is in front of you except for a small ENVELOPE at your feet. The ENVELOPE has a wax seal pressed into the shape of a wrapped hard candy.

body.raw: You arrive at The Container Store.
